(Sartre 1956, 394) In her work on the ‘cultural politics of emotion’ Sara Ahmed poses the question, ‘what do emotions do?’ (2004) rather than asking what emo- tions are. As she suggests, ‘emotions are not simply something “I” or “we” have.
